No/ => 不

The problem is, when you spread the news, or when you decide to use force, the most important thing is what the other is doing, and why we attack. Therefore, you would not write, “A woman is clearing the Lennon wall with her bare hands, then she was stopped.”
問題係，做文宣嘅時候，同埋要用武力嘅時候，重要嘅係對方在做甚麼，我方為什麼出擊。所以你唔會寫「有女空手撕紙，跟住被人制服」。

You need to be clear why we attack. In the footage, it was not clear what the knife was. There was also no explanation of what the woman was doing other than clearing the wall and holding a ‘knife’ just before she was pined on the ground. If the ‘knife’ was really a putty knife and the woman was using it to clear the wall, the woman would be pined without a good cause.
要講清楚為什麼出擊。「持刀」，在影片中看不清究竟物件是甚麼。也沒有交待女人在被制服前，除了揸住嗰把嘢喺度撕紙外，仲做緊乜嘢。如果嗰把係 Putty Knife，個女人係無理遇襲。而且會覺得你係屈咗佢。

The shape of a knife is usually pointed. In the footage, the object had a flat end. Given the context that the woman was clearing the wall, people would reason that the object was actually a putty knife. The title did not mention that the woman attacked anyone. Therefore, there is reason to suspect that the woman was tackled without good cause.

You need to be clear why we attack. In the footage, it was not clear what the knife was. There was also no explanation of what the woman was doing other than clearing the wall and holding a ‘knife’ just before she was pined on the ground. If the ‘knife’ was really a putty knife and the woman was using it to clear the wall, the woman would be pined without a good cause.
要講清楚為什麼出擊。「持刀」，在影片中看不清究竟物件是甚麼。也沒有交待女人在被制服前，除了揸住嗰把嘢喺度撕紙外，仲做緊乜嘢。如果嗰把係 Putty Knife，個女人係無理遇襲。而且會覺得你係屈咗佢。

The shape of a knife is usually pointed. In the footage, the object had a flat end. Given the context that the woman was clearing the wall, people would reason that the object was actually a putty knife. The title did not mention that the woman attacked anyone. Therefore, there is reason to suspect that the woman was tackled without good cause.

如果對方有刀形嘅物體，而又唔係喺攻擊範圍內，唔係正在攻擊，正常做法係首先保持距離。之後係叫對方收起把刀，或者把刀放在地上。

在影片中，女人係背對連儂牆，而且被敵對的人圍着，不論誰正誰邪，因為女人是被圍，所以女人即使持刀，係屬於自衛。在影片中，沒有證據女人不是在自衛。

1. 女人被圍着，無路可逃
2. 刀看來似是批刀，是清連儂牆合理工具 (有 benefit of the doubt)
3. 影片中女人沒有攻擊任何人
4. 影片中女人被制服後沒有反抗
5. 影片中女人沒有從地上執起把「刀」(沒有證據地上嘅刀係女人嘅)

影片中嘅證據係對人群不利。證據係人群無理把女人按在地上。但係如果嗰把刀係西瓜刀就唔同，因為西瓜刀喺現場係比較無理。哩啲「證據」乜乜物物，唔係話香港有法治。我係話第三者睇呢段片會諗乜嘢。段片本身係對人群不利，樓主也沒有解釋發生了甚麼事。所以段片仍然係對人群不利。

我唔係講緊現場有沒有做錯。我係講緊樓主哩個post 有問題。傳出去也有問題。
